title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
at opening the way involves lightning sparks and torches.

Continue progressing through the Act 3 Main Quests until you reach Wyrm's Rock Prison. This is where you will be able to find the entrance to Ansur's lair.

Reading the Legend of Ansur gives you a clue, you need to hit 2 dragon-shaped lanterns with lightning damage to reveal the entrance.

Find the way to Ansur.

We've reached the Wyrmway, where the great wyrm Ansur resides. We must make our way to him.

There are 4 trials in The Wyrmway
